DataStorage - Class in paoo.game.database
The DataStorage class is a serializable container used to store and retrieve player-related data such as level, life, inventory, and game time.
DataStorage() - Constructor for class paoo.game.database.DataStorage
 
DbManager - Class in paoo.game.database
The DbManager class provides an interface to manage the database operations related to saving and loading player data for the game.
DbManager() - Constructor for class paoo.game.database.DbManager
Constructs a DbManager instance and establishes a connection to the SQLite database file named game.db.
